short_summary: Request for Proposal to purchase office seating
full_summary:
**Rotary Chairs RFP**
================ Added amendments and notifications.

### Solicitation Overview

The Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) has released an **Invitation to Bid (ITB)** for **Rotary Chairs** under the contracting entity's Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-120001/G. This ITB is a part of a broader product subcategory 1 - Rotary chairs.

### Bidder Eligibility and Requirements

Eligible bidders should be pre-qualified and hold a **General Stream (SA) supply arrangement** with the Canadian Government. If you are a Non-SA holder, you must submit a bid to the **Identified User (IU)** and an arrangement to the **Supply Arrangement Authority (SAA)** for evaluation.

**Applicable Trade Agreements:**

This bid is governed by the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement (CUSMA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP)

### Contract Requirements and Information:

Subject to the above Canadian trade agreements, the contracting entity has a requirement to purchase office seating for the following locations:

*   70 Crémazie Street, Gatineau, Quebec
*   365 Laurier Avenue West, Ottawa, ON

The expected delivery and installation date for all office chairs must be completed on or before March 31, 2023. Bidders are expected to consult the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) for detailed information.

**Important Dates and Documents**

*   **Amendment 2** of the original bid was added on 2023-02-01.
*   **Bid documents** can be found at the following URLs: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/6db30a07ced21b970aff6e58eb10a2d2/office_seating_155745_rfp_-_en.pdf> and <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/
